original_title: SLPP unaware of today’s APC agenda: S.M. Chandrasena
original_body_lines: The Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna (SLPP) is unaware of the agenda of the All Party Conference to be held this afternoon, SLPP MP S.M. Chandrasena said.
He told a news conference that President Ranil Wickremesinghe has invited the SLPP, as a political party, to participate in the meeting.
"I am also planning to attend. We don't know exactly about the agenda of the meeting," he said responding to a question.
The MP said the SLPP is participating in the meeting as a political party and they would agree on constructive proposals and object to proposals detrimental to the country.
"We are a political party that can take independent decisions," he said. (Ajith Siriwardana)
